name: geometric abstract #06
description: modern geometric abstract is based on the love for abstraction and contrasting colours by muhammad hassam waraich, architect and artist from karachi. By calling his collection abstract, he let the ideology of each collectible hidden yet giving some meaning to it and keeping it a journey of exploration for anyone who wants to perceive it in their own way. The whole collection consists of 100 unique abstract collectibles and each collectible is only minted as a single and exclusive edition on the blockchain.
